sentences.sContent: The baby kept banging the table with his spoon.
sentences.sCn: 宝宝不停地拿调羹敲桌子。

sentences.sContent: ...NASA is developing a series of robotic probes that will get the most bang from a buck...

synos.tran: 直接地；砰然地；突然巨响地

phrases.pCn: n. 宇宙大爆炸；创世大爆炸
成功地；大大地；砰地一声；热气腾腾地

trans.tranCn: 猛击， 猛撞； 发出砰的一声， 砰砰地响； 砰地敲
trans.tranOther: to hit something hard, making a loud noise
a sudden loud noise caused by something such as a gun or an object hitting a hard surface
